content_kanji_strokes_label_1.description: The description of the number of strokes when there is exactly 1 stroke

content_names_dictionary.description: The title used at the top of the popup when showing the names dictionary

error_command_could_not_parse.message: 「$command$」の構文解析が失敗しました

error_command_disallowed_modifier_key.message: 「$modifier$」という修飾キーは利用できません

error_ctrl_alt_unsupported.message: ご利用中のFirefoxバージョンはAltとCtrlの組み合わせに対応していません
error_ctrl_alt_unsupported.description: Tooltip displayed when the user attempts to set a hotkey combination including both Ctrl and Alt in a version of Firefox prior to 63

error_ctrl_alt_warning.description: Tooltip displayed when the user attempts to set a hotkey combination including both Ctrl and Alt in a version of Firefox later than 63

error_loading_dictionary.message: 辞書の読み込みが失敗しました。もう一度有効してみてください。

extension_description.message: 単語の上にマウスのカーソルを合わせたら日英辞書を引く。
extension_description.description: Description of the what the extension does.

head_info_label_ateji.description: Short annotation given to kanji headwords that are ateji (kanji chosen to represent sounds)

head_info_label_gikun.description: Short annotation given to kana headwords with gikun (meaning as reading) or jukujikun (special kanji reading)

head_info_label_ikana.description: Short annotation given to (mostly?) kana headwords that have rare use of kana

head_info_label_ikanji.description: Short annotation given to kanji headwords that have rare use of kanji

head_info_label_io.description: Short annotation given to kanji headwords that have rare use of okurigana

head_info_label_okana.description: Short annotation given to kana headwords that use out-dated kana

head_info_label_okanji.description: Short annotation given to kanji headwords that use out-dated kanji

head_info_label_ukanji.description: Short annotation given to kana headwords that are normally written in kanji alone

menu_enable_extension.description: Context menu item to enable the extension.

options_cancel_update_button_label.description: Label for the button to cancel a database update

options_data_series_date_only.message: $generated$に生成された$source$のデータに基づいている。

options_data_series_version_and_date.message: $generated$に生成された$source$ $version$のデータに基づいている。

options_database_unavailable.message: データベースストレージ利用不可

options_downloading_data.description: Label while we are downloading updates

options_edrdg_license.message: このデータはElectronic Dictionary Research and Development Group (EDRDG)の所有権であり、EDRDGのライセンスに準拠して使用しております。
options_edrdg_license.description: Description of license terms. The keywords 'Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group' and options_edrdg_license_keyword must appear so they can be linkified. IT SHOULD BEGIN WITH APPROPRIATE SPACE IN LANGUAGES THAT SEPARATE SENTENCES WITH WHITESPACE.

options_edrdg_license_keyword.description: The keyword in options_edrdg_license to link to the license

options_highlight_matched_text.message: 照合される文字列をハイライト

options_hold_to_show_keys_description.message: 押しながらポップアップを表示する

options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation.message: ボタンを押しながら、マウスをテキストに合わせるとポップアップが表示されます。ボタンが選択されていない場合、ポップアップが常に表示されます。
options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation.description: This is supplementary explanation to options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation

options_kanji_components.description: Option to define if radicals are displayed or not

options_keyboard_heading.description: Heading for options to configure keyboard commands

options_name_data_name.description: The name for the name database data set

options_name_data_title.description: The name data series title and version

ref_label_kk.description: The label used when presenting Kanji Kentei levels
